Name: Separation Anxiety 1 of 7 - "Seeds of Destruction"
Flavor Text: "Five symbiotic seeds have been taken from Venom's body. Join in the quest to prevent these "children of evil" from bounding with the life foundation hosts. [ End ]

Name: Scarlet Witch™ - Spell of Destruction
Game Text: Opponent must draw one card from Draw Pile. Drawn card and any duplicate of it, placed or in hand, must be discarded.

Name: Scarlet Witch™ - Spontaneous Combustion
Game Text: Opponent must discard 1 placed card of Scarlet Witch's choice.

Name: Scarlet Witch - Sorceress Slam
Game Text: Acts as a level 6 Strength attack.
TRIVIA: Printed with a Fighting icon in place of a Strength icon.

Name: Separation Anxiety 5 of 7 - "Ventilator Blues"
Flavor Text: "Avoid the mayhem using the city's ventilation system. Duke it out in the maze of filters and razor walls against robotic terrors and the second symbiotic spawn. [ End ]

Name: Separation Anxiety 3 of 7 - "A Hot Welcome"
Flavor Text: "Breach the entrance to to the doomsday bunkers and lay waste to the onslaught of jury members. Find the demon seeds before another Carnage is created.

Name: Separation Anxiety 2 of 7 - "A Bridge to Bedlam"
Flavor Text: "Cross the unfinished span as you search for the foundation. Beast some sense into the paranoid patricians who would rule armageddon. [ End ]

Name: Separation Anxiety 7 of 7 - "Carnage Uncaged!"
Flavor Text: Freed from his glass incarceration, the havoc that is Carnage is once again on the loose. Stop him at all costs, before it's too late! [ End ]

Name: She Hulk (sic)™ - Power Proxy
Game Text: Target hero must discard 1 placed Power card of She Hulk's (sic) choice.

Name: She Hulk (sic)™ - Emerald Allure
Game Text: Attack made on teammate is now made on She Hulk (sic), who may defend it.

Name: Separation Anxiety 4 of 7 - "City Beneath the Soil"
Flavor Text: "Invade the subterranean city. Barrel over a legion of laser lugging robots. Subdue the first of the deadly symbiotes hatched to protect the Foundation. [ End ]

Name: She Hulk (sic)™ - Elbow Grease
Game Text: Only attacks made with Universe cards may be played against She Hulk (sic) for remainder of battle.

Name: Separation Anxiety 6 of 7 - "Check-Point Charley"
Flavor Text: "Hustle your team passed the security station. Outmaneuver the deadly traps that would force you to your doom and turn the tables on the next two symbiotes. [ End ]

Name: She Hulk (sic)™ - She-Hulk Smash
Game Text: Acts as a level 4 Strength attack. May combine with a Universe card. Universe bonus added to Venture totalfor this battle.

Name: Silver Sable™ - Chia
Game Text: Acts as a level 6 Fighting attack. Cannot be defended by a card with a Strength icon.

Name: She Hulk (sic)™ - Vitamin "G"

Game Text: Acts as a level 5 Energy attack. May make 1 additional attack.

Name: Silver Sable™ - Katana

Name: Sins of the Future 1 of 7 - "The New Order"
Flavor Text: "The Sentinels have embarked on a bloody campaign of destruction. Defeat the first onslaught of robotic hunters, mutant turncoats, and genocidal allies. [ End ]

Name: Sins of the Future 2 of 7 - "Fractured Logic"
Flavor Text: "A new directive drives the deadly machines to protect humanity. They must first conquer it! Destroy the plans of the would-be usurpers. [ End ]

Name: Sins of the Future 4 of 7 - "The Fight for Freedom"
Flavor Text: Invade the concentration camps of the racist regime of Sentinels. Face the guards. Wreck the camp, and liberate the prisoners of war. [ End ]

Name: Sins of the Future 3 of 7 - "The Face of Death"
Flavor Text: "The forces of wholesale mutant extermination have a new ally, the Master Mold. Challenge him and his supporters, and ensure the safety of the free world. [ End ]

Name: Silver Surfer™ - Double Power Blast
Game Text: Acts as a level 4 Energy attack. May combine with 1 Energy card for a single attack.

Name: Silver Sable™ - Leadership
Game Text: All Silver Sable Special cards are doubled when determing Venture total this battle.

Name: Sins of the Future 5 of 7 - "Search and Destroy"
Flavor Text: "Rebel forces have discovered the location of the Sentinel processing plant. Raid the factory, eliminate its protection, and leave nothing but rubble. [ End ]

Name: Sins of the Future 7 of 7 - "The Ultimate Evil"
Flavor Text: "Challenged by the ultimate evil, Nimrod. Overthrow him and his supporters, and guarantee that his crusade of madness is over. [ End ]

Name: Sins of the Future 6 of 7 - "Traitors and Turncoats"
Flavor Text: "Stand off against the forces that have aligned themselves with the death-dealing Sentinels. Overcome the betrayers, and dismantle the army of conspirators. [ End ]
